name: GrubMarket
headline: AI-powered technology enabler and digital transformer of Americanâ¦
description: GrubMarket is the AI-powered technology enabler and digital transformer of American Food Supply Chain industry. Our mission is to build and provide the eCommerce and software technologies to this industry, to transform this completely offline and highly manual industry into modernized online industry powered by software technologies, and improve the efficiency of American food supply chain.

raw_markdown='![](http://grubmarket.com/assets/icons/logo_black.svg)
We’re on a mission to digitally transform the American food supply chain industry. 
B2B eCommerce
Access high quality, exclusive products at low prices, across the U.S. and Canada

## Who We Are
GrubMarket is a food technology company with a mission to digitally transform the American food supply chain industry. 
![](http://grubmarket.com/assets/images/image 22.png)
Founded in 2014, GrubMarket is a food tech/eCommerce company operating in the U.S and Canadian food supply chain, serving both business customers and end consumers, as well as providing software-as-a-service solutions to digitally transform businesses throughout the food supply chain. GrubMarket operates in Arizona, California, Connecticut, Georgia, Michigan, New York, New Jersey, Missouri, Massachusetts, Nevada, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Texas, Washington and British Columbia (Canada), with plans to expand to the rest of the U.S., Canada, and other parts of the world. 
![](http://grubmarket.com/assets/images/image 22.png)
#  Unparalleled network for buying wholesale 
Serving all of the U.S. and Canada, GrubMarket’s extensive and growing network of wholesalers and distributors sells to customers across a variety of segments - from grocers to foodservice to schools, government, local markets and restaurants. Tap into the network to get access to thousands of high quality food products at exclusive, low prices. 
[Buy Wholesale](http://grubmarket.com/<https:/business.grubmarket.com/>)
“Our ability to offer superior services and the finest quality produce year after year is powered by our deep operational know-how, enduring relationships with our customers and vendors, and our investments in world-class digital transformation.” 
Carole Shandler
President of Shapiro-Gilman Shandler, GrubMarket 
![](http://grubmarket.com/assets/images/group1968.png)
#  AI-powered software fueling digital transformation 
Improve efficiency, business insight, and customer satisfaction with GrubMarket’s suite of AI-powered software solutions that cover inventory, warehouse management, grower accounting, HR, eCommerce, payments, and custom mobile apps for food wholesalers, distributors, and brokers; and CSA management for farmers. 
[Learn More](http://grubmarket.com/<https:/www.grubmarket.com/hello/software/index.html>)
![](http://grubmarket.com/assets/images/group1968.png)
#  Enterprise AI solutions for the food supply chain 
Innovative Enterprise AI solutions from GrubMarket empower people and businesses throughout the food supply chain with deep insights, intelligent analysis, voice-powered assistance, and automated order extraction across channels. 
[Learn More](http://grubmarket.com/<https:/www.grubmarket.ai>)
#  Farm-fresh fooddelivered across the U.S. 
Get farm-fresh, local food delivered to your door all across the U.S., at prices up to 50% LESS than grocery stores! 
[Order Delivery](http://grubmarket.com/<javascript:;>)
### Just some of our local food hubs
###  Just some of our local food hubs

[ ![](http://grubmarket.com/assets/images/good-eggs-logo.png) ](http://grubmarket.com/<https:/www.goodeggs.com/home >) [ ![](http://grubmarket.com/assets/images/FreshGOGO_logo.png) ](http://grubmarket.com/<https:/www.freshgogo.com/?language=en>) [ ![](http://grubmarket.com/assets/images/Boston_Organics_logo.png) ](http://grubmarket.com/<https:/bostonorganics.grubmarket.com/ >) [ ![](http://grubmarket.com/assets/images/Doorganics_logo.png) ](http://grubmarket.com/<https:/doorganics.grubmarket.com/ >)
#  Sustainability at GrubMarket 
Sustainable California demonstrates GrubMarket's commitment to preserving the sustainability of California's farming environment, empowering farmers, and reinvigorating California's agricultural ecosystem. 
[Learn More](http://grubmarket.com/<https:/sustainability.grubmarket.com/>)
“We are excited to launch the Sustainable California initiative to protect, support, and uplift California's fragile agricultural ecosystem." 
Mike Xu
CEO of GrubMarket
“We are excited to launch the Sustainable California initiative to protect, support, and uplift California's fragile agricultural ecosystem." 
Mike Xu
CEO of GrubMarket

generated_description:
GrubMarket, founded in 2014 and part of Y Combinator Batch W15, is bringing a refreshing digital transformation to the American food supply chain. Based in San Francisco, the company is all about enabling the offline food industry to thrive in the online space. Their mission? To harness AI and cutting-edge technology to improve efficiency and access within the food supply chain.

At GrubMarket, you'll find a two-pronged approach: they cater to both B2B customers, like wholesalers and distributors, and end consumers seeking quality food delivery at lower prices—up to 50% cheaper than traditional grocery stores. They're not just playing the eCommerce game; GrubMarket integrates software-as-a-service solutions for businesses, enabling them to manage inventory, streamline operations, and gain insights into supply chain dynamics through AI.

What makes GrubMarket particularly compelling is their extensive network across the U.S. and Canada. This enables them to connect buyers with thousands of high-quality food products at exclusive rates. They serve a broad customer base—from grocers to schools to restaurants—and aim to broaden their reach even further into Canada and beyond.

Sustainability is also at heart of GrubMarket's ethos. Their initiatives, such as the “Sustainable California” program, underline their commitment to preserving agricultural ecosystems while empowering local farmers.

Their product offerings range from wholesale food purchasing to AI-powered enterprise solutions, making them a versatile player in food tech. To catch a glimpse or get involved, head over to their website—everything from ordering fresh produce to learning more about their sustainability efforts is just a click away.

In short, GrubMarket isn't just reshaping how we think about food distribution; they're redefining it, making farm-fresh groceries accessible and affordable for everyone while propelling the industry into the modern age.
